[ M , +oo ) |-> A ( n ) ` is a positive decreasing function approaching zero, then the infinite sum ` sum_ n , X ( n ) A ( n ) ` is convergent, with the partial sum ` sum_ n <_ x , X ( n ) A ( n ) ` within ` O ( A ( M ) ) ` of the limit ` T ` . Lemma 9.4.1 of [Shapiro], p. 377. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-May-2016.)
